title: Spatial Cognition-Based Geometry Learning Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric concepts (2D/3D shape properties) and foundational STEM literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening spatial reasoning skills for professional applications in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately project 3D objects onto 2D planes and explain spatial relationships
Learners can infer real-time geometric transformations (rotation/symmetry/translation) in VR simulation environments and establish problem-solving strategies
Learners can express geometric problems using visual analysis tools (graphs/diagrams) and propose improvements based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
